message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I can't go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,000?
